scripts.dev: npm run dev:api & npm run dev:web
scripts.dev:api: npm run configure:api && cd apps/api && python3 -m pdm run uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload
scripts.dev:web: npm run configure:web && cd apps/web && npm run dev
scripts.api: cd apps/api && python3 -m pdm run python start.py
